title: I Cant find the fonts " AR JULIAN " Please Help!!!
content:
I lost the fonts AR Julian when my computer crashed and can not find it anywhere... It is used for my company name and can be seen at [www.national-electrical.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20121030010427/http:/www.national-electrical.com/ "www.national-electrical.com")

No one in the sign business can find it, nor the web. If anyone knows anything about it or a different name used for it please let me know.  
Thank you very much...  
Paul
author: svtcobr

comments.content:
I think this is a slight modification of [Letraset Brighton](http://web.archive.org/web/20121030010427/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/brighton/). The gap in the A is the most obvious change.

- Mike Yanega
If you send me your address, I can transmit you the font AR Julian. Please, send the address at [luciano@medianteam.it](mailto:luciano@medianteam.it). Bye. Luciano
Thank you so much, I will send it know,
I had no problems finding the font with Google.
